sections.title: Companies
sections.paragraphs:
* [[ABM Industries]], an American corporation
* [[ABM United Kingdom Limited]], a United Kingdom software company
* [[Advantage Business Media]], a private American company
* [[Pressed Metal Corporation South Australia|Australian Bus Manufacturers]], a former Australian bus manufacturer
* Associated British Maltsters, a malting company taken over by [[Dalgety plc]]

sections.title: Computing
sections.paragraphs:
* [[Advanced Bit Manipulation]], an instruction set extension for x86
* [[Agent-based model]], a specific individual-based computational model for computer simulation
* [[Asynchronous Balanced Mode]], a communication mode of HDLC and derivative protocols

sections.title: Military
sections.paragraphs:
* [[Anti-ballistic missile]], missile systems designed to counter ballistic missiles
* [[Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty]], a treaty between the United States and USSR
* [[Air Battle Manager]], a rated flying position in the US Air Force

sections.title: Other
sections.paragraphs:
* [[Automated banking machine]], dialectical term for automated teller machine
* [[ABM (video game)|''ABM'' (video game)]], a 1980 game for the Apple II
* [[Abanyom language]], a Niger-Congo language of Nigeria
* [[Abertawe Bro Morgannwg University Health Board]], an NHS Trust in Wales
* [[Account-based marketing]], a targeted approach to marketing to a key account
* [[Activity-based management]], a strategic decision-making method
* [[Meningitis|Acute Bacterial Meningitis]], commonly referred to as ABM when caused by bacterial pathogens
* [[Agaricus Blazei Murill]], a Brazilian mushroom
* [[Abahlali baseMjondolo]], movement of South African shack dwellers
* [[Ansar Bait al-Maqdis]], an Egyptian militant organization

* [[Northern Peninsula Airport]], in Queensland, Australia (IATA airport code)
